players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Alice and Charlie, what do you think about Diana's death? Any suspicions so far?"
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and found out his true role."
You: "I'm not sure about anything yet. I think it's too early to make any accusations."
Bob: "I find Charlie's accusation suspicious and unsubstantiated. Why reveal your investigation so openly? It could be a tactic to mislead us all."
Charlie: "Bob is trying to deflect and discredit me because he knows the truth. We must vote to arrest Bob now to protect the town and avoid more deaths."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
